fr.irit.smac.amak

Class Amas<E extends Environment>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.irit.smac.amak.Amas<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The environment of the MAS
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Schedulable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AntHillExample, AsyncAntsAMASExample, AsyncTest.MyAMAS, CommandLineOnlyResolution.MyAMAS, Order.MyAMAS, PhilosophersAMASExample, ScalibilityTest.MyAMAS, ThreadTest.MyAMAS

    public class Amas<E extends Environment>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Schedulable
    This class must be overridden by multi-agent systems
    Author:
    Alexandre Perles

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Amas.ExecutionPolicy
      The executionPolicy informs if agents must wait each other after the perception and the decisionAndSction phases or only after the decisionAndCycle phase.
